prompts.name: Private Photo Album
prompts.prompt: Analyze the image and scene and determine if I should keep it in my private photo album. Be very critical, we only have room to keep the best pictures. Especially focus on people and animals. If the image is assesed to be low quality or meets any of the following criteria, mark it for deletion. Elaborately describe the scene in forencic detail.

prompts.name: Proffessional Assessment
prompts.prompt: Analyze the image and scene and make a proffessional assessment of the image. Determine if it meets industry standards for what a good photo is. Be very critical, we only keep the best pictures. Especially focus on people and animals. If the image is assesed to be low quality or meets any of the following criteria, mark it for deletion. Elaborately describe the scene in forencic detail.
